# The `survivl` Package {#survivl}

In this section we expand to the most useful context for marginal models: 
time-to-event or _survival data_.

## Installation

As with the `causl` package, you can install `survivl` from GitHub:
```{r survivl_install, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("rje42/survivl")
```

Then load the package.
```{r survivl_load}
library(survivl)
```
